content: My son will graduate basic training on April 9th he wants to get married the same week after he graduates. Can anyone help me with how to go about getting someone to marry them. We are aware of the 72 hour waiting period after getting the marriage license but we need to find someone to marry them. He is at Lackland AFB

title: getting married same week of graduation from Basic training

content: the old Justice of the Peace trick usually works...... or send them to Vegas and if they don't like it they can get divorced all in the same weekend... but having parking validations is a plus in such cases. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE

content: I would tell him to wait until he is out of his training school and has a little rank so that he can support a wife, buy furniture, food etc. What is his rush? He has the rest of his life to get married and settle down. If he must he can always go into town and find a justice of the peace, a judge, or most ministers to marry them.
